value.name: Civil Air Patrol honors members who gave first aid to teens in 2020 Westgate shooting
value.description: The Arizona Wing of the Civil Air Patrol honored two members who assisted teens injured in the 2020 Westgate shooting in Glendale.

video.name: Video shows armed person in Westgate parking lot after Arizona shooting

value.name: The LAPD’s All-Civilian Disciplinary Panels Appear to Be Going Easy on Officers
value.description: The relatively new Board of Rights panels that review police misconduct cases are handing down more lenient punishments than Chief Michel Moore

value.name: Blenheim man charged with impaired driving
value.description: A 27-year-old Blenheim man was charged with impaired driving after he almost rolled his vehicle into a ditch early Thursday morning, Chatham-Kent police say. An off-duty officer stopped to check on the man’s well-being after the incident on Queens Line just before 6 a.

video.name: Blenheim man charged with impaired driving

value.name: Political drama in Bayonne: Mayor aiming to oust two councilmembers
value.description: Multiple county sources said the mayor is looking to push Council President Sharon Nadrowski and Councilman Sal Gullace out by running new candidates for their seats next year.

value.name: Croydon tram crash inquest opens
value.description: The inquest into the deaths of seven people killed in the Croydon tram crash opens on Monday. A further 51 were injured when the derailment happened in south London on November 9 2016. The inquest was initially due to begin in October 2020,

value.name: ACLU Class-Action Suit Against St. Louis Police Hits Snag With Appellate Ruling
value.description: “They were basically saying, ‘You’ve got to get this to trial and look at these issues, and we can’t just leave this preliminary injunction in place forever,’” said attorney Mark Smith.

value.name: Cochrane Search and Rescue volunteers endure difficult conditions in search for Calgary man
value.description: Stanley Stooshinoff has been missing for a week. The 68-year-old Calgary man was last seen by his wife at their northeast Calgary home on Wednesday, May 19 before he headed out for a day hike to the Sandy McNabb camping area.

value.name: Police search for man in connection with South Shields burglary
value.description: Mark Smith, 45, is wanted by officers in connection with a burglary in the town on November 25. A Northumbria Police spokesperson said: "We have searched a number of addresses across South ...

value.name: Letters: The police don't stand a chance in today's Scotland
value.description: IF Mark Smith can't distinguish between "celebration" and eviction ("Pubs. Protests. And votes. What can reasonable people do about the SNP?", The Herald, May 15), his claim to reasonableness ...

value.name: Jury sworn in for Croydon tram crash inquest
value.description: A jury has been sworn in ahead of the three month-long inquest into the deaths of seven people killed in the Croydon tram crash.Coroner Sarah Ormond-Walshe held a minute’s silence for the victims on the first day of the inquest at Croydon Town Hall on Monday.
